name: Memory (Pinecone)
description: Long-term memory backed by Pinecone with integrated inference

indexName.description: Name of the Pinecone index (must already exist)

namespace.description: Namespace within the index for memory isolation

autoCapture.description: Automatically capture facts, preferences, and decisions from conversations

autoRecall.description: Automatically inject relevant memories before each turn

topK.description: Maximum number of memories to recall per turn

similarityThreshold.description: Minimum similarity score for search results (0-1)

deduplicationThreshold.description: Minimum similarity to consider a memory a duplicate (0-1)

captureMode.description: Memory capture strategy: 'heuristic' uses regex pattern matching, 'llm' uses an LLM to extract and reconcile facts

openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key (supports ${OPENAI_API_KEY} syntax). Required when captureMode is 'llm'

llmModel.description: OpenAI model to use for fact extraction and reconciliation
